resources.string: Let us show you the best attractions of Wrocław! \n Swipe to see them
Main market square, the heart of the city. It is 213m x 178m large. You can find an old gothic historic City Hall there.
The oldest part of the city. You can find many churches and the cathedral there.
The main building of University of Wrocław was built in 1739 and is the most beautiful example of baroque style in the city.
In the moment of built in 1913 it was a building with the biggest dome in the world. It is also listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site
ZOO Wrocław is a home to over 10 000 animals of more than 1100 species. Its main attraction is Africarium - the oceanarium with Africa theme.
It was built in 2012 for European Football Championship. It has capacity of over 45 000 audience.
It was built in 1857 and some people say it reminds them of a palace rather than railway station, due to its outstanding architecture.
